attributes.description: This vehicle has the balance of the 4 year 120 000 km warranty (whichever comes first) which expires on 29th July 2026 as well as the balance of the 6 year 90 000 km service plan which expires in 29th July 2028. Features include: 10 speed automatic transmission, electronic rear diff lock, remote central locking, electric adjustable side mirrors, leather seats, electric driver’s seat, heated front seats, multi-function steering wheel, Tyre pressure monitoring system, lane assist, pre collision assist with pedestrian detection, active park assist with parallel parking, lane departure warning, adaptive cruise control, touch screen radio with cd and usb, ISOFIX, key less entry and start, navigation, Bluetooth, rain sensing wipers, auto headlights, LED daytime running lamps, 18inch alloy wheels, reverse camera, tow bar, drop in bin-liner with 12volt power socket, park distance control sensors front and rear, reverse camera, front fog lamps and side steps. Trade ins welcome, finance facilities available and deliveries arranged nationwide.

attributes.description:
Finding a high quality, reliable pre-owned vehicle can be complicated. That’s why Kia Northcliff offers a straightforward, risk-free solution to purchasing your next pre-owned vehicle. We take pride in the quality of our pre-owned vehicles by thoroughly inspecting and ensuring their roadworthiness, authenticating service history, and verifying mileages.  

Kia Konfidence is backed by Kia Motors South Africa, and supported by a nationwide dealer network that ensures excellent trade-in evaluations and nation-wide delivery.  

You can also choose from a wide range of vehicle finance options through Kia Financial Services. Add to this a premium customer experience, and you are guaranteed many happy kilometres for years to come. Flexible finance option to suit any budget engage with our experienced trustworthy team today.
